00045     public static function isScriptCallback( $sValue )
00046     {
00047         return is_string( $sValue ) &&
00048             (
00049                 $sValue === 'true' ||
00050                 $sValue === 'false' ||
00051                 0 == strncasecmp( $sValue, 'function(', 9 ) ||
00052                 0 == strncasecmp( $sValue, 'new Date(', 9 ) ||
00053                 0 == strncasecmp( $sValue, 'jQuery(', 7 ) ||
00054                 0 == strncasecmp( $sValue, '$(', 2 )
00055             );
00056     }

00067     public static function parseRulePattern( $oPattern, $bPrivate = false )
00068     {
00069         //  Seed our rules array...
00070         $_arRules = self::defaultRuleSet( $bPrivate );
00071 
00072         if ( null !== $oPattern )
00073         {
00074             //  Split up pattern (type{:defaultValue{:externalName{:isRequired{:allowedValue(s)}}}})
00075             $_arPattern = ( ! is_array( $oPattern ) ) ? explode( ':', $oPattern ) : $oPattern;
00076 
00077             //  Type is required, but we can default to string.
00078             $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_TYPE ] = CPSHelperBase::o( $_arPattern, 0, CPSHelperBase::o( $_arRules, CPSOption::RPT_TYPE, 'string' ) );
00079 
00080             //  Fix up types...
00081             switch ( $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_TYPE ] )
00082             {
00083                 case 'int':
00084                     $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_TYPE ] = 'integer';
00085                     break;
00086 
00087                 case 'bool':
00088                     $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_TYPE ] = 'boolean';
00089                     break;
00090             }
00091 
00092             //  Default value (default default value is null)
00093             if ( $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_DEFAULT ] = CPSHelperBase::o( $_arPattern, 1, CPSHelperBase::o( $_arRules, CPSOption::RPT_DEFAULT ) ) )
00094             {
00095                 //  Evalute default if we have one...
00096                 if ( $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_TYPE ] !== 'string' && ! empty( $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_DEFAULT ] ) )
00097                     $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_DEFAULT ] = eval( 'return ' . $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_DEFAULT ] . ';' );
00098             }
00099 
00100             //  Different name for external use?
00101             $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_EXTERNAL_NAME ] = CPSHelperBase::o( $_arPattern, 2, CPSHelperBase::o( $_arRules, CPSOption::RPT_EXTERNAL_NAME ) );
00102 
00103             //  Required value? Must eval to bool(true)
00104             $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_REQUIRED ] = ( bool )( eval( 'return ' . CPSHelperBase::o( $_arPattern, 3, CPSHelperBase::o( $_arRules, CPSOption::RPT_REQUIRED, false ) ) . ';' ) === true );
00105 
00106             //  And finally the allowed values. If string contains '|', will be transformed to an array
00107             $_arRules[ CPSOption::RPT_ALLOWED ] = ( is_string( $_oAllowed = CPSHelperBase::o( $_arPattern, 4, CPSHelperBase::o( $_arRules, CPSOption::RPT_ALLOWED ) ) ) && false !== strpos( $_oAllowed, '|' ) ) ? explode( '|', $_oAllowed ) : $_oAllowed;
00108 
00109             //  Clean rules
00110             foreach ( $_arRules as $_sKey => $_oValue ) if ( null === $_arRules[ $_sKey ] ) unset( $_arRules[ $_sKey ] );
00111         }
00112 
00113         //  and return...
00114         return $_arRules;
00115     }
00116 
00120     public static function defaultRuleSet( $bPrivate = false )
00121     {
00122         return array(
00123             CPSOption::RPT_TYPE => 'string',
00124             CPSOption::RPT_DEFAULT => null,
00125             CPSOption::RPT_EXTERNAL_NAME => null,
00126             CPSOption::RPT_REQUIRED => false,
00127             CPSOption::RPT_ALLOWED => null,
00128             CPSOption::RPT_PRIVATE => $bPrivate,
00129         );
00130     }

00132     /***
00133      * Validates all options in a collection
00134      * @param ICPSOptionContainer $oContainer
00135      */
00136     public static function validateOptions( IPSOptionContainer &$oContainer )
00137     {
00138         //  Get the option collection and validate
00139         foreach ( $oContainer as $_oOption )
00140             self::validateOption( $_oOption );
00141     }

00149     public static function validateOption( CPSOption &$oOption, $oValue = null )
00150     {
00151         //  We all start innocent
00152         $_bPassed = true;
00153 
00154         //  Get the value to test
00155         $_oValue = CPSHelperBase::nvl( $oValue, $oOption->getValue( true ) );
00156 
00157         //  Check required values...
00158         if ( ! $_bPassed = ( $oOption->getIsRequired() && null === $_oValue ) )
00159             throw new CPSOptionException( "Option \"{$oOption->getName()}\" is required." );
00160 
00161         //  Fix up types...
00162         $_arType = $oOption->getOptionType();
00163         if ( ! is_array( $_arType ) ) $_arType = array( $_arType );
00164 
00165         //  Allowed type?
00166         foreach ( $_arType as $_sKey => $_sType )
00167         {
00168             //  Check type...
00169             switch ( $_sType )
00170             {
00171                 case 'bool':
00172                 case 'boolean':
00173                     $_bPassed = is_bool( $_oValue );
00174                     $_sType = 'boolean';
00175                     break;
00176 
00177                 case 'int':
00178                 case 'integer':
00179                     $_bPassed = is_int( $_oValue );
00180                     $_sType = 'integer';
00181                     break;
00182 
00183                 case 'float':
00184                     $_bPassed = is_float( $_oValue );
00185                     break;
00186 
00187                 case 'double':
00188                     $_bPassed = is_double( $_oValue );
00189                     break;
00190 
00191                 case 'array':
00192                     $_bPassed = is_array( $_oValue );
00193                     break;
00194 
00195                 case 'object':
00196                     $_bPassed = is_object( $_oValue ) || $_oValue === null;
00197                     break;
00198 
00199                 case 'string':
00200                     $_bPassed = is_string( $_oValue ) || $_oValue === null;
00201                     break;
00202 
00203                 default:
00204                     //  If we get here, we have unknown or user-defined type. If not null, test it.
00205                     if ( null !== $_sType && 'NULL' !== $_sType ) $_bPassed = ( $_oValue instanceof $_sType );
00206                     break;
00207             }
00208 
00209             if ( ! $oOption->isValidType( $_sType ) )
00210                 throw new CPSOptionException( Yii::t( __CLASS__, 'Invalid type "{y}" specified for "{x}"', array( '{y}' => $_sType, '{x}' => $_sKey ) ), 1  );
00211 
00212             if ( ! $_bPassed )
00213             {
00214                 $_sValType = gettype( $_oValue );
00215                 throw new CPSOptionException( "Option \"{$oOption->getName()}\" expects values to be of type \"{$_sType}\". \"{$_sValType}\" given." );
00216             }
00217 
00218             $oOption->setRule( CPSOption::RPT_TYPE, $_sType );
00219         }
00220     }

00222     /***
00223      * Makes an array of key=>value pairs in an array.
00224      *
00225      * @param array $arOptions The options to use as a source
00226      * @param integer $iFormat
00227      * @param boolean $bNoCheck
00228      * @return mixed
00229      */
00230     public static function makeOptions( IPSOptionContainer $oContainer, $bPublicOnly = true, $iFormat = CPSHelperBase::OF_JSON, $bNoCheck = false )
00231     {
00232         //  Check them first...
00233         if ( ! $bNoCheck ) self::validateOptions( $oContainer );
00234 
00235         //  Get our public callbacks...
00236         $_arCallbacks = $oContainer->getValue( 'callbacks', array() );
00237 
00238         //  Remove it
00239         $oContainer->unsetOption( 'callbacks' );
00240 
00241         //  Our output array
00242         $_arOut = array();
00243         $_sEncodedOptions = null;
00244 
00245         //  Tag callbacks for special processing afterwards
00246         foreach ( $_arCallbacks as $_sKey => $_oValue )
00247         {
00248             if ( ! empty( $_oValue ) )
00249                 $_arOut[ "__pscb_{$_sKey}" ] = $_sKey;
00250         }
00251 
00252         //  Now build our final array...
00253         $_arRaw = $oContainer->getRawOptions( true );
00254 
00255         foreach( $_arRaw as $_sKey => $_oOption )
00256         {
00257             //  Skip nulls...
00258             $_oValue = $_oOption->getValue();
00259 
00260             if ( ! empty( $_oValue ) || '0' === $_oValue )
00261             {
00262                 $_sExtName = $_oOption->getExternalName();
00263 
00264                 //  Check for callbacks in the inner array (.i.e. "buttons" from jqUI dialog)
00265                 if ( is_array( $_oValue ) )
00266                 {
00267                     foreach ( $_oValue as $_sSubKey => $_oSubValue )
00268                     {
00269                         if ( self::isScriptCallback( $_oSubValue ) )
00270                         {
00271                             $_arCallbacks[ $_sSubKey ] = $_oSubValue;
00272                             $_arOut[ $_sKey ][ "__pscb_{$_sSubKey}" ] = $_sSubKey;
00273                         }
00274                         else
00275                         {
00276                             if ( ! isset( $_arOut[ $_sExtName ] ) || ! is_array( $_arOut[ $_sExtName ] ) ) $_arOut[ $_sExtName ] = array();
00277                             $_arOut[ $_sExtName ][ $_sSubKey ] = $_oSubValue;
00278                         }
00279                     }
00280                 }
00281                 else
00282                 {
00283                     if ( self::isScriptCallback( $_oValue ) )
00284                     {
00285                         $_arCallbacks[ $_sKey ] = $_oValue;
00286                         $_arOut[ "__pscb_{$_sKey}" ] = $_sKey;
00287                     }
00288                     else
00289                         $_arOut[ $_sExtName ] = $_oValue;
00290                 }
00291             }
00292         }
00293 
00294         if ( count( $_arOut ) )
00295         {
00296             switch ( $iFormat )
00297             {
00298                 case CPSHelperBase::OF_JSON:
00299                     $_sEncodedOptions = CJSON::encode( $_arOut );
00300                     break;
00301 
00302                 case CPSHelperBase::OF_HTTP:
00303                     foreach ( $_arOut as $_sKey => $_sValue )
00304                     {
00305                         if ( ! empty( $_sValue ) )
00306                             $_sEncodedOptions .= '&' . $_sKey . '=' . urlencode( $_sValue );
00307                     }
00308                     break;
00309 
00310                 case CPSHelperBase::OF_ASSOC_ARRAY:
00311 //                  if ( ! empty( $_arCallbacks ) )
00312 //                      throw new CPSOptionException( 'Cannot use type "ASSOC_ARRAY" when callbacks are present.' );
00313 
00314                     $_sEncodedOptions = $_arOut;
00315                     break;
00316             }
00317 
00318             //  Fix up the callbacks and return...
00319             return self::fixCallbacks( $_sEncodedOptions, $_arCallbacks );
00320         }
00321 
00322         //  Nada
00323         return null;
00324     }

00334     public static function checkOption( CPSOption $oOption )
00335     {
00336         //  Required and missing? Bail
00337         if ( null === ( $_oValue = $oOption->getValue() ) && $oOption->isRequired )
00338             throw new CPSOptionException( Yii::t( __CLASS__, '"{x}" is a required option', array( '{x}' => $oOption->name ) ), 1 );
00339 
00340         //  Check if this is a valid value for this option
00341         if ( null !== ( $_arValid = $oOption->getAllowed() ) )
00342         {
00343             if ( null !== $oValue && ! in_array( $_oValue, $_arValid ) )
00344                 throw new CException( Yii::t( __CLASS__, '"{x}" must be one of: "{y}"', array( '{x}' => $sKey, '{y}' => implode( ', ', $_arValid ) ) ), 1  );
00345         }
00346 
00347         //  Looks clean....
00348         return true;
00349     }
00350 
00358     public static function checkOptions( IPSOptionContainer $oContainer )
00359     {
00360         //  One at a time...
00361         foreach ( $oContainer->getRawOptions() as $_oOption )
00362             self::checkOption( $_oOption );
00363 
00364         //  We made it here? We cool baby!
00365         return true;
00366     }

00375     public static function checkCallbacks( IPSComponent $oComponent )
00376     {
00377         $_arCallbacks = $oComponent->callbacks;
00378         $_arValidCallbacks = $oComponent->validCallbacks;
00379 
00380         if ( ! empty( $_arCallbacks ) && ! empty( $_arValidCallbacks ) )
00381         {
00382             foreach ( $_arCallbacks as $_sKey => $_oValue )
00383             {
00384                 if ( ! in_array( $_sKey, $_arValidCallbacks ) )
00385                     throw new CException( Yii::t( __CLASS__, '"{x}" must be one of: {y}', array( '{x}' => $_sKey, '{y}' => implode( ', ', $_arValidCallbacks ) ) ) );
00386             }
00387         }
00388 
00389         //  Clean...
00390         return true;
00391     }
00392 
00398     protected static function fixCallbacks( $sOutput, $arCallbacks )
00399     {
00400         $_sOut = $sOutput;
00401 
00402         foreach ( $arCallbacks as $_sKey => $_oValue )
00403         {
00404             $_sQuote = '"';
00405 
00406             //  Indicator to quote key...
00407             if ( '!!!' == substr( $_sKey, 0, 3 ) )
00408             {
00409                 $_sQuote = '\'';
00410                 $_sKey = substr( $_sKey, 3 );
00411             }
00412 
00413             $_sSearch = '"' . self::CB_KEY . $_sKey . '":"' . $_sKey . '"';
00414 
00415             if ( self::isScriptCallback( $_oValue ) )
00416                 $_sReplace = $_sQuote . $_sKey . $_sQuote . ' : ' . $_oValue;
00417             else
00418                 $_sReplace = $_sKey . ' : \'' . $_oValue . '\'';
00419 
00420             $_sOut = str_replace( $_sSearch, $_sReplace, $_sOut );
00421         }
00422 
00423         return $_sOut;
00424     }
